medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening constant left sided abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain onset at 0900 this morning, now radiating into the mid abdomen. Patient reports some associated nausea, denies vomiting or diarrhea. Reports normal bowel movement earlier today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation on blood thinner (rivaroxaban), vertigo, hypertension, high cholesterol.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died due to ischemic colitis; father died at age ___ of rheumatic fever and heart failure; sister is alive and well.
